title: cmake error: adios2 w/ Intel - can't find MPI
body:
Trying to build `adios2` w/ `%intel@19.1.0.166` and `cmake@3.17.3` on `centos7-haswell`. MPI is `mpich@3.2.1`.

Using `spack@develop` (15-Aug, 395b478b1b4184eeb5c923c74b8325c00d382354)

Concrete spec: [adios2.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5078980/adios2.spec.yaml.txt)
Build output: [adios2-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5078981/adios2-build-out.txt)
CMakeError: [adios2-CMakeError.log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5078986/adios2-CMakeError.log.txt)
CMakeOutput: [adios2-CMakeOutput.log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5078988/adios2-CMakeOutput.log.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./adios2.spec.yaml
...
-- Checking whether /spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifort supports Fortran 90
-- Checking whether /spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifort supports Fortran 90 - yes
-- Found MPI_C: /spack/linux-centos7-haswell/intel-19.1.0.166/mpich-3.2.1-yssouem44baw7i5vwcbmnrwuubnjepji/lib/libmpi.so (found version "3.1") 
-- Could NOT find MPI_CXX (missing: MPI_CXX_WORKS) 
-- Found MPI_Fortran: /spack/linux-centos7-haswell/intel-19.1.0.166/mpich-3.2.1-yssouem44baw7i5vwcbmnrwuubnjepji/lib/libmpifort.so (found version "3.1") 
CMake Error at /spack/linux-centos7-haswell/intel-19.1.0.166/cmake-3.17.3-bh322xvbenu3epngwxcxmvmtaww2pwmq/share/cmake-3.17/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:164 (message):
  Could NOT find MPI (missing: MPI_CXX_FOUND) (found version "3.1")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /spack/linux-centos7-haswell/intel-19.1.0.166/cmake-3.17.3-bh322xvbenu3epngwxcxmvmtaww2pwmq/share/cmake-3.17/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:445 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /spack/linux-centos7-haswell/intel-19.1.0.166/cmake-3.17.3-bh322xvbenu3epngwxcxmvmtaww2pwmq/share/cmake-3.17/Modules/FindMPI.cmake:1717 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  cmake/FindMPI.cmake:10 (include)
  cmake/DetectOptions.cmake:152 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:139 (include)
```

DAG:
